title: Travel and Tourism 2
sentences: Wir schlafen heute Nacht in einem
We are sleeping in a tent tonight.
The campsite is located directly by the lake.
Wir machen eine Wanderung durch die
We are going on a hike through nature.
Don't forget to pack your camera.
The landscape here is simply breathtaking.
Wir haben eine Kabine auf dem
We booked a cabin on the cruise ship.
I would like to visit the old town.
Is there a tourist information office here?
The travel guide (book) contains many useful tips.
We are doing a city tour by bus.
I need an entrance ticket for the castle.
The church is a famous sight.
We have a great view of the mountains.
The coast is very rocky here.
We are spending the day at the beach.
Would you like to rent a bicycle?
I got lost in the forest.
The sun is burning very strongly today.
We need sun protection for the skin.
We are crossing the border to Austria.
I only speak a little bit of German.
I forgot my backpack on the train.
The mountain air is very healthy.
We are making a campfire in the evening.
I wish you a nice vacation!
dictionary:
das Zelt - tent
der Campingplatz - campsite
der Schlafsack - sleeping bag
die Natur - nature
die Kamera - camera
die Landschaft - landscape
das Kreuzfahrtschiff - cruise ship
die Altstadt - old town
die Tourist-Information - tourist information
der Reiseführer - travel guide (book)
die Stadtrundfahrt - city tour
das Museum - museum
die Eintrittskarte - entrance ticket
die Kirche - church
der Blick - view
die Küste - coast
der Strand - beach
das Fahrrad - bicycle
sich verlaufen - to get lost (on foot)
die Sonne - sun
der Sonnenschutz - sun protection
der Sonnenbrand - sunburn
das Abenteuer - adventure
die Grenze - border
ein bisschen - a little bit
übersetzen - to translate
der Rucksack - backpack
die Bergluft - mountain air
das Lagerfeuer - campfire
der Urlaub - vacation
